text: Peter Michael Nicholas (May 16, 1941 â€“ May 14, 2022) was an American businessman and philanthropist. He co-founded the medical device company Boston Scientific with partner John Abele in 1979. He died on May 14, 2022, two days before his 81st birthday. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Businesspeople from New Hampshire Category:American philanthropists
